thread.title: Acadiana/Lafayette High Highlight Week 7 Games On Town Square Media
thread.title_full: Acadiana/Lafayette High Highlight Week 7 Games On Town Square Media

author: Steve Peloquin
title: Acadiana/Lafayette High Highlight Week 7 Games On Town Square Media
text:
Acadiana/Lafayette High Highlight Week 7 Games On Town Square Media By Steve Peloquin October 16, 2015 5:43 AM (Photo by Ronald Martinez/Getty Images) 

The annual rivalry game between the Acadiana Wreckinâ€™ Rams and the Lafayette High Lions highlights four week 7 games that can be heard on Town Square Media tonight, with one more available courtesy of live YouTube streaming. 
The District 3-5A match-up between Acadiana and Lafayette High can be heard on ESPN 1420 and espn1420.com . 
Acadiana will enter the contest at 4-2, overall, and 3-0 in district play, while Lafayette High is currently 2-4, and 0-2, respectively. 
In other action, News Talk 96.5 FM KPEL-FM and kpel965.com will air the Abbeville/Breaux Bridge game, Planet Radio 105.1 FM and planet1051.com will air the Comeaux/St. Martinville game, and finally, the Ascension Episcopal/Centerville game can be heard on Talk Radio 960 AM and talkradio960.com. 
Also tonight, you can hear all the Lafayette Christian/Hanson game on the ESPN 1420 YouTube channel at https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpj4ld2TtbYNAfWXUHGGe0A/live
